Module worldofzuul
Package sdu.student

Class FXMLController

java.lang.Object
sdu.student.FXMLController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class FXMLController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The type Fxml controller. Controller for the primary Game scene.

    • subscribeToEnvironmentChanges

      private void subscribeToEnvironmentChanges​(Environment environment)
      Subscribe to room environment changes. Adds listeners to call changeNightStage(boolean) and changeRainState(boolean) upon update of param environment's property Environment.nightStateProperty() and Environment.rainStateProperty() respectively.
      Parameters:
      environment - the environment

    • unsubscribeToEnvironmentChanges

      private void unsubscribeToEnvironmentChanges​(Environment environment)
      Unsubscribe to environment changes. Removes listeners added by subscribeToEnvironmentChanges(Environment).
      Parameters:
      environment - the environment

    • changeRainState

      private void changeRainState​(boolean isRaining)
      Change rain state. Displays or hides rain animation contained in rainImagePane.
      Parameters:
      isRaining - the is raining

    • changeNightStage

      private void changeNightStage​(boolean isNight)
      Change night stage. Displays or hides nightLayerPane.
      Parameters:
      isNight - the is night

    • roomPaneClicked

      public void roomPaneClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      roomPane clicked. If MouseEvent.getButton() is MouseButton.PRIMARY button is clicked interact with GameObject without an Item if target GameObject is within playerInteractDistance. If MouseEvent.getButton() is MouseButton.SECONDARY button is clicked interact with GameObject with the players selected Item if target GameObject is within playerInteractDistance
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouse event

    • faceDirection

      private void faceDirection​(Direction vectorDirection)
      Face direction. Display image in imageView corresponding to correct direction using images defined in model's player.
      Parameters:
      vectorDirection - the vector direction

    • selectItem

      public void selectItem()
      Set model's player item to be the item selected in inventoryTableView.
